body: Producer and Mayu is having an affair. He told her he's not doing well with his family, and Mayu is holding to the hope that one day Producer will choose her over his family. But she knew he's lying, that he's in good relationship with his family. Mayu is just a partner he can take escape and have sex without having to worry about many other things like with his wife. In the end, Mayu confronted him about it, and because he can't choose her instead of his family, she decided to end it all, and even retire from idol business. He never heard of her again after that.
